癑字的基本解释

癑
nòng
痛。
病。
疮溃烂。

癑
nóng
　ㄋㄨㄥˊ
古同“脓”。

癑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nóng］
［《集韻》奴冬切，平冬，泥。］
脓，疮溃。

癑字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癑； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页781第14
【唐韻】奴動切【集韻】【正韻】乃湩切，?音?。【說文】痛也。【集韻】一曰瘡潰。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?奴凍切，音齈。義同。　又奴冬切，音農。腫血也。　又【集韻】奴宋切，病也。

癑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
癑字的起名意思

暂无。

癑
Basic explanation of words
癑
nòng
pain.
disease.
Sores fester.
癑
nóng
ㄋ ㄨ ㄥ
The ancient same "pus".
癑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nóng］
["Jiyun" Nudong cut, Pingdong, mud. ]
Pus, sore ulcers.
癑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　癑; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 781 14
[Tang Yun] Slave moving cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] It’s 湩cut, "yin?". [Said the text] It hurts too. [Jiyun] One said sore ulceration.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Slave frozen cut, sound stunned. The same meaning.　Nutong cut again, Yinnong. Swollen blood also.　 [Ji Yun] Slave Song Qi, also sick.
